sentences.en: "Her passengers, the other hostages, will never forget her calm, confident, valorous work" (William W. Bradley).
sentences.cn: “她的乘客，其他人质，永远不会忘记她冷静的、自信的、勇敢的举动” （威廉·W·布拉德利）。

sentences.en: Griffin - Sets forth the property of a valorous soldier whose magnanimity is such that he will dare all dangers, and even death itself, rather than become captive.
sentences.cn: 狮鹫-出征的勇士以其无畏的精神敢于对抗一切危险，宁愿阵亡也决不被生俘。

sentences.en: Seed your tears deep in your heart it will grow up to valorous flowers.
sentences.cn: 把眼泪种在心里，会开出勇敢的花朵。

sentences.en: The discoverer of the Pacific walked " valorous and serene " into the public square and was beheaded.
sentences.cn: 这位太平洋的发现者 “ 英勇无畏,泰然自若地 ” 步入公共广场,被斩首处决.

sentences.en: Throughout the coming years, he would commit great and valorous deeds.
sentences.cn: 纵观今后几年内, 他将致力于伟大和valorous事迹.
